cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to 0 will cause invalid thread configuration and PUSCH processing failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting absoluteFrequencySSB to 0 will cause invalid SSB frequency configuration and synchronization signal transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 absoluteFrequencySSB 設定為 0 會導致無效的 SSB 頻率配置和同步信號傳輸失敗。
